name: S&P 500 ETF

about.what_it_is: SPY is an exchange-traded fund designed to track the S&P 500 Index.
about.what_it_represents: It represents broad large-cap U.S. equity market exposure.
about.who_or_what: Issued by State Street, it holds a basket of U.S. large-cap stocks.
about.how_it_works: Its price follows the index through a portfolio that mirrors S&P 500 constituents.
